report:
Premise: A young girl is popping bubbles a woman is blowing.

Two people are playing together.

Premise: Two girls wade in the surf, and one shows of her flexibility.

The two girls are tanning in the sun.

Premise: A man with a beard reclines in the snow.

The man is inside.

Premise: These people are in a restaurant, having drinks, and playing various instruments.

People in a restaurant having fun.

Premise: Two adults and a small child pose outside a dwelling.

A family poses in front of their home.

Premise: Man in yellow shirt waiting for his car to be washed.

A man is having a service performed.

Premise: A white fluffy dog leaning though a window.

A dog leans out a window.

Premise: An old man gets some barbecue

An old man has a plate full of barbecued beef brisket and short ribs.

Premise: A girl is swinging and looking down with her hair flying.

girl swinging

Premise: The girl in the purple jacket is laying in a hole that has been dug out of the snow.

A girl is playing.
